entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Perf][Mono][Interpreter] Regression in Call Benchmarks #63029
  • Vector256.Create() doesn't document that it corresponds to _mm256_setr_epiN (set reverse) #63019
  • Filter TPL events on synchronous TaskWaitBegin #63016
  • [HTTP/3] test failure: Public_Interop_ExactVersion_BufferContent_Success fails with CONNECTION_IDLE #63009
  • EventSource_SuccessfulHandshake_LogsStartStop failures on Windows11 #63008
  • Channel<T>.Reader.ReadAllAsync() may make memory leak #63006
  • Suboptimal field layout when an object is wrapped in a struct #63005
  • Test failure readytorun\\crossgen2\\crossgen2smoke\\crossgen2smoke.cmd #63004
  • Test failure Interop\\StringMarshalling\\VBByRefStr\\VBByRefStrTest\\VBByRefStrTest.cmd #63003

Closed

  • Possible typo: "This method is intended for compiler user..." #62248
    Future
  • Static abstract methods missing during runtime #62920
    7.0.0
  • [Uri] LocalPath shouldn't encode unicode chars #62946
  • Assertion failed '(tree->gtFlags & GTF_GLOB_REF) || ((obj != nullptr) && (obj->gtOper == GT_LCL_VAR))' during 'Morph - Structs/AddrExp' (IL size 36) #62815
  • JsonSerializer.SerializeToElement has wrong XML documentation #62993
    7.0.0
  • JsonIgnore in record declaration #62961
  • .net 6 blazor can't publish #62332
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • improve TLS resume on server #63030
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Make test System.Data.Tests.AppDomainsAndFormatInfo.Bug55978 more robust #63028
    area-System.Data, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Override same attributes found at class and property level in ApplicationSettingsBase #63025
    area-System.Configuration, 7.0.0
  • Delete some null checks #63024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary assignment of a value to local variables in SPC #63020
    area-System.Runtime
  • More static in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter #63017
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
  • [release/6.0] Use Ubuntu 18.04 and dotnet-buildtools-prereq docker images for enterprise linux pipeline #63014
    area-System.Net
  • LoggingHttpMessageHandler should log unescaped URL in log message (#62894) #63012
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution

Merged

  • Various WASM AOT changes #62997
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fixed typo in remarks section of OnCompleted #62982
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • Fix for a rare race condition in System.IO.Packaging #63013
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • WinHttp: always read HTTP/2 streams to the end #62870
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve XML documentation #62994
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix managed CoreCLR build on Android #63002
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1521917 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Tweak set timeout #62898
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose AppContext.SetData in ref assembly #62996
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: yet another OSR stress mode #62980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend CPU capabilities detection for osx-arm64 (#62832) #62958
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Avoiding assert on mono runtime #62816
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Run getter using Runtime.GetProperties #62857
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #62850
    area-codeflow
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix source-link test #62914
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • Move coreclr specific ComponentActivator hosting dependency to coreclr #62903
    linkable-framework, area-Interop-mono
  • Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #62989
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interace for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Superpmi.py: Detect changes in jiteeversionguid.h #63000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not create non-null assertions from location nodes #62743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Refactor `fgDebugCheckFlags` #62948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Skip Linq tests, which are not supported in interpreter only build (without FEATURE_COMPILE) #61914
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Encapsulate the logic of caching the last synchronously completed task. #61781
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [LoongArch64] add all the coreclr-build-config files #62889
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-inc,gc, ToolBox directory. #62886
    community-contribution

Issues

Created

PullRequests

  • Respect opt-outs from dotnet/msbuild#7008 #22719

Issues

Created

  • Open question for semi-auto properties #5563

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong circular base type dependency errors on nested type inheritance #58424
  • Provide IDE hint for specifying attribute target #58422

Closed

  • Ref with null suppression operator is not considered a value write #58161
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 'convert namespace' to only 'dedent' file contents, not format them. #58434
    Area-IDE
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts. #58433
    Area-Interactive
  • Remove unused message argument #58432
    Area-Compilers
  • Required modifier parsing #58431
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Improve error reporting for 'this()' initializer from 'record struct' constructor #58430
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix incremental build failures #58429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove weak-refs to the compilation (without generated docs) in the compilation tracker. #58425
    Area-IDE
  • Nullable analysis for Conditional/ObjectCreation conversions working through a delegates. #58420
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58418
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58417
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58415
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Update underline-reassigned-variable to understand suppressed variables as well #58428
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add initial test for inline diagnostics tagger #58427
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unnecessary assertion that CancellationSeries is disposed #58426
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58416
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Inline Diagnostics Multi-Line Error Bug #58398
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #58414
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58388
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58396
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Analyzer load failure suppress #58376
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE
  • Call InitializeTelemetrySession on background thread #58399
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, UX Review Not Required
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1520547 #58374
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding EntryAssembly to AddRazorPages/AddControllers* #39126
  • >>NET6 Blazor WASM debugging when running in IIS #39125
  • HTTP Error 500.19 - Internal Server Error/ Error code 0x8007000d #39123
    .NET 7 Planning
  • A better implementation to the definition of IUrlHelper.IsLocalUrl #39119
  • SignalR Reconnection after Disconnection unwires existing event handlers #39118

Closed

  • SignalR: Handling Redis lost connection. #38944
  • Remove obsolete types from code and code parts that uses types not available in higher versions. #38985
  • IHttpConnectionFeature missing after migrate from .net-5 to .net-6 #39113
  • Desperate attempt to resurface issue #10117 #39116
  • Perf regression: json #39117
  • asp-page tag helper not behaving as described in online docs #39107

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore identical types when loading routable components #39129
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Trim "Async" Suffix #39128
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Upgrade SDK #39127
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `054a986` to `97a4675` #39120
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39008
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Use full suffixed version for DepProviderKey in installers #39035
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 2.1.32 & merge internal commits #39029
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [WIP] ANCM on ARM64 #38997
    area-runtime
  • [wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor, .NET 7.0
  • Adding EntryAssembly to AddRazorPages/AddControllers* #39085
    area-mvc
  • Support Custom Classes for ValidationMessage #38639
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Archiving .NET MAUI Blazor Android apps not working #3816
  • [Enhancement] iOS: Add support for BarButtonItem to Share API to set position of presentation controller #3813

Closed

  • Unable to run any preview 10 maui/blazor projects #3812
  • Maybe it not be supported in Windows rs-22523. #3814

PullRequests

Created

  • Listview handler #3817

Merged

  • Enable `InternalsVisibleTo` for `CommunityToolkit.Maui.Core` #3798

Updated

  • Radiobutton Handler #3784
    area/controls 🎮
  • Clip layouts to bounds #3709
    area/layout 🔲
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • WinUI Flyout Handler #3735
    area/FlyoutPage
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deployment is copying the wrong DLL version? #27049
  • Do not map annotation to database during migrations #27048
  • EF Core features that require unsupported C# versions in LINQ expression trees #27047
  • does efcore has IDbCommandTreeInterceptor like ef6? #27043

Closed

  • Why I can't use AsSplitQuery() in all places where I want to? #27044

PullRequests

Created

  • There's no escape from those cold north winds #27050

Updated

  • Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #26935
  • Use conventions and model snapshot in the migration tests #27031
